resources.string:
This app can add 'Extensible Tender Example' buttons as a custom tender type for your merchant account. You can implement them for:

 Secure Payment app via Intent Action: clover.intent.action.CUSTOMER_TENDER 

 Sale and Register apps via Intent Action: clover.intent.action.MERCHANT_TENDER

Here you would gather what\'s required by your payment methods (i.e scan a QR code, etc.) and then communicate with your server to authenticate your payment. For this example, these buttons work as if the payment was accepted or rejected.
Custom tender not found. Tap button to initialize it for your merchant account.
Custom tender is setup for your merchant account.
Unable to get tenders for merchant account
